summary: Three Broadway producers struggling to get backing for their show hope one's sudden inheritance of a half interest in a Parisian fashion house is the answer. They travel to Paris only to learn the salon is in debt and requires their help.
cast: Kathryn Grayson|Red Skelton|Howard Keel|Marge Champion|Gower Champion|Ann Miller|Zsa Zsa Gabor|Kurt Kasznar|Marcel Dalio|Diane Cassidy|Marika Aba|Jo Ann Aehle|Bette Arlen|Frank Arnold|Paul Bradley|Rosalee Calvert|Peter Camlin|Alma Carroll|André Charlot|James Conaty|George Davis|Bess Dawson|Jean De Briac|Daniel De Jonghe|Jack Del Rio|Jean Del Val|Mary Jo Devlin|Carli Elinor|Franklyn Farnum|Robert Haines|Sam Harris|Thomas Browne Henry|Georgia Holt|Zori Jennings|Lillian Kassan|Shirley Kimball|Honey King|Henri Letondal|Jane Lynn|Alphonse Martell|John Maxwell|Philo McCullough|Frank McLure|Harold Miller|Hans Moebus|Henry Orozco|Manuel París|Alfred Pollet|Tao Porchon|George Restivo|Suzanne Ridgway|Helen Rinford|Joan Roberts|Marilyn Rogers|Cosmo Sardo|Perry Sheehan|Molly Sinclair|Rosemarie Stack|Phyllis Stanley|Bert Stevens|Kitty Sully|Judy Swann|Carlo Tricoli|Pierre Watkin
title: El amor nació en París
